paper_abstract: We show how to compute in O(n (4/3)log (1/3) n+n (2/3) k (2/3)log n) time the distance between k given pairs of vertices of a planar graph G with n vertices. This improves previous results whenever (n/log n)(5/6)a parts per thousand currency signka parts per thousand currency signn (2)/log (6) n. As an application, we speed up previous algorithms for computing the dilation of geometric planar graphs.
